our_philosophy.title: People-Focused
our_philosophy.description: Fostering a positive culture, enhances engagement.

scope_of_work.title: Piping
scope_of_work.desc: Design, fabrication, and installation of onshore oil and gas pipelines. We ensure materials meet ASME standards and consider safety and environmental conditions.

scope_of_work.title: Fabrication
scope_of_work.desc: Structural fabrication services, including steel structures and pressure vessels for industrial applications.

scope_of_work.title: Steel Structure
scope_of_work.desc: Construction and installation of steel frames for oil and gas facilities, ensuring compliance with international standards.

scope_of_work.title: Civil Work
scope_of_work.desc: Earthworks, demolition, and site preparation, along with concrete foundations, pipe supports, and drainage systems. We also provide building services for sub-stations and storage facilities.

scope_of_work.title: Other Services
scope_of_work.desc: Anti-corrosion coatings, industrial cleaning, and manpower supply.
